docs.snippet: Mohammed Alhajali, 23, who survived a perilous crossing by sea and found refuge in Britain, was among the first victims of the Grenfell Tower fire to be identified.

headline.print_headline: Syrian Refugee Is Among Victims of London Fire
headline.main: Syrian Refugee Is Among Victims of London Fire

docs.snippet: A marketing effort to get free razors in the hands of young men for their 18th birthdays has sometimes reached the wrong target.

headline.print_headline: Welcome to Manhood, Gillette Told the Woman, 50
headline.main: Welcome to Manhood, Gillette Told the 50-Year-Old Woman

docs.snippet: The office messaging company is not yet profitable, but new funding could raise its valuation to $5 billion as it faces rivals like Microsoft’s Teams.

headline.print_headline: Slack Is Said to Be Raising $500 Million
headline.main: Slack Is Said to Be in Talks to Raise $500 Million

docs.snippet: Trinh Xuan Thanh, who had fled Vietnam amid accusations of economic mismanagement, appeared on state television denying that he had been forcibly returned home.

headline.print_headline: Germany Accuses Vietnam Of Abducting Asylum Seeker
headline.main: Germany Accuses Vietnam of Abducting Asylum-Seeking Executive

docs.snippet: The parent of the messaging app Snapchat reported earnings that missed Wall Street expectations in almost every regard.

headline.print_headline: Snap Loses $2.2 Billion In 2 Months Since I.P.O.
headline.main: Snap’s $2.2 Billion Loss Caps Bumpy First Months as a Public Company

docs.snippet: New evidence contradicts earlier statements that the tennis player had run a red light before a fatal crash, the authorities said.

headline.print_headline: Evidence Bolsters Williams’s Case in Fatal Crash
headline.main: Venus Williams Lawfully Entered Intersection Before Crash, Police Say

docs.snippet: More than 40 cats were found abandoned in an eight-unit apartment building, apparently left by a former tenant.

headline.print_headline: Cats Found In Building, Halting Demolition
headline.main: Demolition Is Halted on a Queens Building Filled With Cats

docs.snippet: Recently discovered early work by Elliott Erwitt shows Pittsburgh at the cusp of transforming from a gritty industrial city to a livable, cultural hub.

headline.main: Elliott Erwitt’s Lost Photographs of Pittsburgh

docs.abstract: Recently discovered early work by Elliott Erwitt shows Pittsburgh at the cusp of transforming from a gritty industrial city to a livable, cultural hub.

docs.snippet: Across the country's cities, the rapid growth of mobile payments is making cash all but obsolete.

headline.main: In Urban China, Cash Is Rapidly Becoming Obsolete

docs.snippet: Steve Scalise’s shooting compels reflection about our spewing, sparring ways.
